mapper.update: update orders set order_status = #{orderStatus} where order_id = #{orderId}
update orders set order_status = #{orderStatus},version = 1 where order_id = #{orderId} and version = 0

update vs_sc_location_log set longitude = #{longitude},latitude=#{latitude},addr_info=#{address},create_time=now() where location_log_id = '085242611fc97f2a61573d4315b4da46' or location_log_id ='108a3aac48239da0548c9135515f772b' or location_log_id ='37068cb56dec8f4f8dad2ecef98951a4'
mapper.select: select t.task_id,t.service_img,t.service_imgtags from vs_hc_task t LEFT JOIN vs_hc_member_info m on t.service_object_id = m.user_id where t.task_id not in ('91158','91159','91160','91161','91163','91164','91165','91166') and t.payment_state is null or t.payment_state not in('121','122','127') and m.sys_id !='11' and m.sys_id!='2' and t.service_img is not null and t.service_img!=''

select m.mi_id, case m.sys_id when 3 then '2c909e03685edbbf01685edffc960001' when 4 then '4028f74b68a6c85b0168a6eebead0012' when 5 then '2c909e03685edbbf01685ee2fde20007' when 6 then '4028f74b68a6c85b0168a6ee855c0010' when 7 then '4028f74b68a6c85b0168a6ef2b180016' when 8 then '4028f74b68a6c85b0168a6eef6f10014' when 21 then '4028f74b6a4d780e016a4e6fe7bd0005' else sys_id end org_id from vs_hc_member_info m where sys_id is not null and sys_id!=''

SELECT call_id,u.user_name,call_id,c.call_date,'系统迁移' update_by,now() update_date,contacts_id,call_date,hangup_time,TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,answer_time,hangup_time) duration,caller_no,record_path,seat_id,seat_number, call_content,call_content,call_nature, case when call_type='0' then '6' when call_type='1' then '0' when call_type='2' then '7' when call_type='5' then '8' when call_type in ('6','7','8','9') then '2' when call_type='10' then '9' when call_type is null or call_type='' then null else '9' end call_type, DATE_FORMAT(call_date,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') order_no,0 call_object_type,1 care_phone_type from vs_cc_communicate_info c where c.call_date > '2019-04-01'
select c.id from hf_call_info c where c.org_id!='4028f74b6abac476016abfd66da80019' ORDER BY RAND() limit ${size}
